about_the_game:
Arise! The time for sleep has passed. The world needs you now, more than ever, as the threat of destruction looms closer with each passing moment.

The path of salvation lies ahead with only one way to attain it. You must conquer the dungeon and its keeper that awaits you.
Beware not to outstay your welcome as your life energy is slowly drained the longer you stay in the dungeon.

Those brave enough to venture the dungeon are rewarded with items to help power up their equipment, allowing them to reach further into its depths.

Complete quests, fight bosses, collect items and fish like your life depends on it!

Mastering this chaotic world will prove difficult as it transforms with each passing life.
Will you answer the call to save the world?
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Viersion 1.2: ・English Localization added to the Full game ・Playable Demo now available in 11 languages: Japanese, English French, German, Brazilian Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Korean, Thai, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional) ・Easy Mode: Enemy attack damage is halved, Instant death traps in dungeons deal less damage ・Cinematic mode: Graphical updates added to allow for better viewing experience (available on all platforms)


About the Game

Arise! The time for sleep has passed. The world needs you now, more than ever, as the threat of destruction looms closer with each passing moment. The path of salvation lies ahead with only one way to attain it. You must conquer the dungeon and its keeper that awaits you. Beware not to outstay your welcome as your life energy is slowly drained the longer you stay in the dungeon. Those brave enough to venture the dungeon are rewarded with items to help power up their equipment, allowing them to reach further into its depths. Complete quests, fight bosses, collect items and fish like your life depends on it! Mastering this chaotic world will prove difficult as it transforms with each passing life. Will you answer the call to save the world?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.2.3
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Dungeon and Gravestone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later x64
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Steel yourself in the face of insurmountable opposition as you traverse this ever-changing world in a bid to save it from imminent desolation.
supported_languages: English, Polish, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
